title: Split PDF Pages Online | Extract Ranges Instantly
description: Upload a PDF, choose specific pages or ranges, and download each part as a separate file. Everything processes locally in your browser.

openGraph.title: Split PDF Pages Online
openGraph.description: Extract specific pages or ranges into individual PDFs without uploads.

images.alt: Interface showing PDF pages being split

twitter.title: Split PDF Pages Online
twitter.description: Separate pages or ranges into new PDFs locally and securely.

structuredData.name: How to split a PDF
structuredData.description: Upload a PDF and optionally set page ranges to download each part as its own file.

step.name: Upload a PDF
step.text: Drag a PDF into the drop zone or click to pick one from your device.

step.name: Choose ranges
step.text: Enter ranges like 1-3,5 or leave blank to turn every page into its own file.

step.name: Split & download
step.text: Click Split PDF and download each generated document.
